mapper.select: SELECT u.uno, u.email, u.password, u.user_name, u.itno, u.status, u.createdAt, u.status_date, a.authority FROM tbl_user u LEFT OUTER JOIN tbl_auth a ON u.email = a.id WHERE u.status = 1

SELECT u.uno, u.email, u.password, u.user_name, u.itno, u.status, u.createdAt, u.status_date, a.authority FROM tbl_user u LEFT OUTER JOIN tbl_auth a ON u.email = a.id WHERE u.status = 1 and u.email = #{id}

SELECT u.uno, u.email, u.password, u.user_name, u.itno, u.status, u.createdAt, u.status_date, a.authority FROM tbl_user u LEFT OUTER JOIN tbl_auth a ON u.email = a.id WHERE u.status = 1 and u.user_name = #{name}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_user(uno, email, password, user_name, status) VALUES(default, #{id}, #{password}, #{name}, default)
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM member_auth WHERE id = #{id} AND authority = #{auth}
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_user SET status = 0, status_date = now() WHERE uno = #{uno}
UPDATE tbl_user SET user_name = #{name} WHERE email = #{id}
UPDATE tbl_user SET itno = #{type} WHERE email = #{id}
